title: Voyageurs National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Alerts & Conditions          Alerts    Information        Hwy 217 Road Closure (Littlefork to Ray)  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Hwy 217 Road Closure (Littlefork to Ray)  Beginning June 1st, 2016, MN 217 is closed from Littlefork (MN 65) and Ray (US 53) due to road construction.  Motorist will be detoured to highways 71, 11, 332 and 53.  Observe signs.  Detour in effect until September 5, 2016. more          St. Louis County Road 24 (Orr to Crane Lake) Road Construction  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, St. Louis County Road 24 (Orr to Crane Lake) Road Construction  Starting June 6th, 2016, St. Louis County Road 24 between Orr and Crane Lake will be under construction/re-surfacing. Expect traffic delays.  Approximate end date August 23, 2016.             Campsite Closures No closures at this time.         Winter Conditions Please visit our Winter Trails Update for weekly ski/snowshoe trails, snowmobile trail and ice road conditions.
